archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.name: Manage TSS Employee View
archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation:
• Ability to identify employees that are available for temporary staffing, and employees on temporary assignments with approaching end dates.
Employees with upcoming end dates- when an employee’s end date is two weeks away the system adds their name and end date to a list and alerts the recruiters
Employees who are available for work o Employees who have submitted their hours on Workbrain for the pay period- this is configurable enabling TSS staff to display either employees who have submitted hours, or those who haven’t, or both.
